ComicInfo.Title: On The Arachnophobia Set; The Confusing Spider-Dude; The Score Board Kid; Matlocch; The Remarkable Similarities Of Extraterrestrials And Earthlings; Crime-Thwarters Handbook; Send In The Cowabunglers; Smurphy Brawn; Shut-Ups; The Web Of Overexposure; The Arsenico Gall Show; Arachnomania; When All TV Reflects The Simpson Influence; One Fine Day At The Beach; Dork, Man
ComicInfo.Summary:
On The Arachnophobia Set: A stunt spider takes a hard hit while filming Arachnophobia.
The Confusing Spider-Dude: The Simpersons get Spider-Dude to help rescue Barf, who has been kidnapped by the Enigma.
The Score Board Kid: Inverview with a ballplayer who grew up living inside a scoreboard.
Matlocch: A parody of the TV series Matlock.
The Remarkable Similarities Of Extraterrestrials And Earthlings: Comparisons of humans and aliens.
Crime-Thwarters Handbook: Gags featuring the proper terminology for reporting crimes.
Send In The Cowabunglers: A poem about other teenage mutant animals.
Smurphy Brawn: A parody of the TV series Murphy Brown.
Shut-Ups: Gags leading to a Shut-Up punchline.
The Web Of Overexposure: Celebs who wore out their welcome with the public.
The Arsenico Gall Show: A Parody Of The Arsenio Hall Show.
Arachnomania: When Spiders Go Hollywood.
When All TV Reflects The Simpson Influence: Simpsons gimmicks done on other TV shows.
One Fine Day At The Beach: A bully finds a unique way to work out with a nerd.
Dork, Man: A parody of the movie Darkman.
